intro_only_event_multi_whiteday_2022/690: Bonjour, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
We’ve got a special present for you today!

This is to say thanks for everything you’re always
doing for us.

...If you insist, you could thank us by having a
Pokémon battle with us. You’ve gotten so strong.

Yeah, what he said! We’re really counting on
you, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!

...Phew. I’m glad we decided to do this as
a group.

Handing over presents one-on-one is kind
of embarrassing.
Dude, don’t make this awkward...
Hahaha! Anyways! That’s what this is all about.
Some of the other guys have presents for you, too.
But that’s something to look forward to tomorrow!

Hey there, [Name:PlayerNickname ]! Today it’s
our turn to give you something!

We’re here to celebrate how much you’ve
grown as a Trainer here on Pasio.

We’re all looking forward to more of your
electrifying battles!

...By the way, Steven—you didn’t stuff any of
those rocks you love so much in with the gift,
did you?

...How about you? You didn’t set any of your
weird prank traps on the gift, did you?

Hahaha... It’s OK. I know for a fact that there’s
nothing strange in there with the present.
Hm? How do I know that?

That little girl over there just... Wait, where did
she go?
[Name:PlayerNickname ]! You’re here!

The last present’s from us! I bet you’re well
chuffed, aren’t ya?

Anyway, think of it as a reward for all your
hard work. No need to say thanks!
There’s a lot we have to thank you for.

Yeah. Your Pokémon have responded to your
strong and upstanding nature.

Never forget your forthright spirit and pure heart,
and keep growing as a Trainer!
I have a dream that I must fulfill!

Please keep working with me to make it
come true, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!

Hold on a moment. All three of us are dragon
specialists, aren’t we?

How ’bout we snap a pic to commemorate
the occasion?

We could create a physical reminder of this
precious memory... What a wonderful idea.

If we’re gonna do this, why not get all the other
guys in here, too?
All right, it’s selfie time!
